name: Amplitude Digital Inc.
tagline: SEO & PPC Google, Facebook & Amazon Revenue Growth
description:
Amplitude Digital, a leading PPC and SEO digital marketing agency, delivers breakthrough traffic and revenue from first page rankings and high-performing ads.
Founded in 2015, we are a proud Google Partner and three-time recipient of the Tech Innovator Award.
Clients can expect thoughtful strategy and effortless execution as a part of every campaign: a commitment that has led to over a 95% retention rate. Our optimization is built on Big Data, delivered through the Amplitude Audience Intelligence platform and machine-learning algorithms that allow for smarter, faster decisions.
Leading brands such as Marika, Leon Max, Dr. Schulze, Popcornopolis, The Hollywood Sign, Spafinder, Experian, Toyota and Costco have benefited from our work.
In addition to a passion for digital marketing, we have a lot of energy at Amplitude for animal rescue. In 2018, we were recognized as one of the “50 Most Admired Companies in Los Angeles” by The Silicon Review.
